EmailTemplate.name: No Contact - DIY Resources
EmailTemplate.subject: QuickBooks Onboarding: Resources Moving Forward
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Account #{!Contact.CAN__c}
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I have tried multiple time to reach you by phone and email with no avail. I wanted to provide you with some resources that you might need moving forward. If there is anything else you need, please let me know.
Resources
QuickBooks Enterprise:
General Support: (866) 340-7237 Customer Resource Center: http://enterprisesuite.intuit.com/customer-resource-center/ Support Articles: http://support.quickbooks.intuit.com/support/articles/inf23986 Intuit Community Forums: http://community.intuit.com/quickbooks-desktop Advanced Reporting Learning Center: http://qbar.intuitlabs.com/learning.html
Intuit Data Protect:
General Support: (800) 538-2000 Setup and Activation: https://support.quickbooks.intuit.com/support/articles/how21295 FAQ: http://support.quickbooks.intuit.com/support/articles/inf12891
Payroll (Gold and Platinum):
General Support: (866) 223-5562 Support Tools / Articles: http://payroll.intuit.com/support/contact/
QuickBooks Payments:
Sales: (800) 601-4083 Support: (800) 558-9558
QuickBooks Point of Sale:
Sales: (866) 379-6636 Support: (800) 348-0254
3rd Party Providers:
Real World Training is endorsed by Intuit and may have additional costs: https://quickbookstraining.com/ Local Experts: http://enterprisesuite.intuit.com/customer-resouce-center/local-help/ YouTube Channels:
https://www.youtube.com/user/quickbooks https://www.youtube.com/user/intuitacademy
Respectfully,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} | Enterprise Account Manager Work Phone: {!User.Phone} | {!User.Email}
Intuit | simplify the business of life
